attributes.description:
Polyurethane is a polymer composed of a chain of organic units joined by carbamate (urethane) links. While most polyurethanes are thermosetting polymers that do not melt when heated. [7]

attributes.title: PU Flexible Foam

attributes.description:
This material is used to give more strength to the surface of the shoe. This material is also used to make golf balls, other various elastic objects and to coat electronic devices. [6]

Citation:
"Global Trade." China Global Trade. N.p., n.d. Web.
attributes.title: PBR Elastomer

attributes.description:
It is a polymer that approaches elastomeric materials in softness and flexibility, yet can be processed like other thermoplastics. The material has good clarity and gloss, barrier properties, low-temperature toughness, stress-crack resistance. [5]

Citation:
"Global Trade." China Global Trade. N.p., n.d. Web.
attributes.title: EVA

attributes.description:
Carbon black is a material produced by the incomplete combustion of heavy petroleum products such as FCC tar, coal tar, ethylene cracking tar, and a small amount from vegetable oil. [4]

attributes.title: PU Rigid Foam

attributes.description:
Polyvinyl chloride, commonly abbreviated PVC, is the third-most widely produced plastic, after polyethylene and polypropylene. It can be made softer and more flexible by the addition of plasticizers, the most widely used being phthalates. In this form, it is also used in clothing for example the Nike Air Max 180. [10]

"Global Trade." China Global Trade. N.p., n.d. Web.
attributes.title: PVC Rigid

attributes.description: This is where all the materials come together so then the sole, the upper portion and the laces can be made. [12]
